Articles.Content:
I made this some time after one of my stations decided to completely self-destruct/get hit with a docking fuel tank and... explode. While this picture may not be exactly that, it is a monument to all the Kerbals that died that day because of me lol... There was only one survivor: Bill Kerman.

(Blown up version: http://i.imgur.com/7WKlk1h.jpg)
